title: Dinnerbone：新启动器将提供服务端下载！
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
Nathan Adams @Dinnerbone
服务端的下载链接很快会被加入新启动器中，到时候我会通知你们的！（Server links will also be available soonish, through the launcher. I'll let you know when!）
